title: Black Girls CODE New York Chapter Presents - Build a Webpage in a Day
desc: This  Black Girls CODE ?workshop will teach participants how to build their own unique webpage in one day using fun games and activities to introduce HTML, CSS, and basic web structure. All BGC workshops are geared towards introducing participants to the technological universe and encouraging them to pursue careers as tech creators and entrepreneurs. No prior computing experience is necessary. ? This class is intended for girls ages 7-17. ? BlackGirlsCode.com Imagine. Build. Create. ? Interested in volunteering at future BGC events, complete our  Volunteer Registration Form . Interested in attending future BGC events, check out our  Upcoming Programs . ? Refund Policy : Full refunds will be provided upon written request received 7 days prior to the scheduled event date. After 7 days no cash refunds will be allowed. Students will be given credit for fees paid to attend a future session.
